JobFullDesc: Are you interested in supporting one of Microsoft’s most important programs for engaging customers and partners? Are you motivated by an opportunity to directly shape perceptions and the digital transformation plans of executives from Microsoft’s top accounts? The Customer Experience Center Americas West located in Silicon Valley provides an outstanding opportunity through delivery of hundreds of engagements with customers from across the world. Come join the Customer Engagement Team where we lead high-visibility, impactful programs to engage customers and partners. Part of the Enterprise Commercial organization, we host thousands of customers and partners at Microsoft centers around the globe, discussing their business needs and how Microsoft’s solutions will make a difference.   We’re seeking an Envisioning Specialist- someone who is both a great storyteller and passionate technologist to facilitate immersive technology experiences and deliver compelling demos to executive audiences.  Along with your ability to connect with business and technical leaders in storytelling and discussion, you have business acumen and strong knowledge of Microsoft’s Solution Areas. You are results-driven, a natural collaborator, and enjoy building on ideas as well as sharing your expertise and support.  Most importantly, you are passionate about helping our customers and ensuring that their experience will be informative, productive, and inspirational.  This role is highly customer-facing and will spend most of the time facilitating the best demos and technology experiences Microsoft has to offer!ResponsibilitiesInspire and instill confidence in customer audiences by facilitating a wide range of solution area capability demos, industry demos, and customer success demos.Deliver demos in the EBC, Industry Experience Center, and through virtual engagements with remote attendees.Manage the deployment of new technology experiences in the Center, and the general operation and performance of demos and experiences, in partnership with the global technology experience program team.Packaging demo assets, including scripts and training material, for consumption by our other Centers around the world.Share business needs, challenges, and feedback from customer engagements, and provide feedback on existing experiences.Qualifications3+ years of experience in enterprise sales, marketing, or business development – including experience engaging directly with customers and account teams.1+ years presenting product and/or solution demos to large (20+ people) audiences, including internal / external senior executives.A natural storyteller with exceptional communication skills.You will have basic to intermediate-level depth of subject matter expertise in either Microsoft’s Modern Workplace solutions or our Cloud and AI solutions, from a prior sales, marketing or engineering role related to these areas.Ability to multitask and deliver to customers across multiple engagements per day and week.Outstanding cross-team collaboration skills, as part of a small team which will need to work closely supporting one another for mutual success.Bachelor’s Degree, or 5+ years of relevant work experience required.Seeking candidates who reside near Mountain View, CA. Relocation will not be offered.Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.  We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements.
